name: CuE
description:
Help CuE find his way after crash landing on a hostile jungle planet. 

Explore, fight enemies and epic bosses.

Discover ability upgrades to help Cue on his quest for survival and self discovery!

Move - WAD

Aim - Mouse

Fire-Left Mouse Button

Jump - Space

Enter Doorway - E

Flashlight - F (uses energy)

Look Down - V

Unlockables: Jet Booster 

- Space in midair - 

allows the player to perform a second more powerful midair jump

Cloak

 - Q- 

( limits max energy, and energy regeneration but makes CuE temporarily unable to be damaged by enemies as long as there is enough energy remaining.

Cannon Upgrade 

- Passive - 

Raises the damage of CuE's blaster cannon.

 Game developed by Secret Boss Studio for the Itch.io Metroidvania Month 18 Game Jam.
Secret Boss Studio is:
Nick McKinnis and Aaron Parker
https://www.linkedin.com/in/aaron-parker714/
www.linkedin.com/in/nick-mckinnis-gamedesigner

Soundtrack by J0shua G4rcía
